scripts.build:all: npm run build:click && npm run build:auto && npm run build:wheel-click && npm run build:wheel-auto
scripts.deploy:click: npm run build:click && firebase deploy --only hosting:wheel-visit-click
scripts.deploy:auto: npm run build:auto && firebase deploy --only hosting:wheel-visit-auto
scripts.deploy:wheel-click: npm run build:wheel-click && firebase deploy --only hosting:wheel-indiana-click
scripts.deploy:wheel-auto: npm run build:wheel-auto && firebase deploy --only hosting:wheel-indiana-auto
